entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
